about_the_game:
Worst Idea is a 2D action platformer set in a crime-ridden future city where power is divided between competing companies. For one of these, business begins to decline, and its head decides to hire a trained special agent who will dutifully serve for his benefit and resolve issues with competitors. Sometimes you have to do this quite brutally, but the hired agent is trained to do this. You are such an agent. Immediately you go to your new boss to receive your first task. Your motivation is money and a place in the company. The agent immediately gets the hang of it and does whatever he is told to do without any problems. But at one point they begin to give him more and more difficult tasks, which begins to alarm him...

MAIN FEATURES

  • Exciting fights
  • A variety of enemies
  • Different ways to kill enemies
  • Interesting locations
  • Pixel art and animations

name: Worst Idea
short_description: A 2D platformer where two arms trading companies are fighting in the city of the future due to competition. You are hired as an agent who has to follow all orders and serve the interests of the company for money and a place in it.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Korean
